data.name: WhatsApp: Dark Theme
data.description:
This theme turns your Whatsapp into a lovely Dark Theme to prevent eyestrain.

[TIP]: You can also Customise the default Green Colour to whatever you desire in the 'Customise Settings' tab.


Join our Discord Server for new Themes, Updates, and more:
https://discord.me/-CELESTIAL



Tags: whatsapp, whats app, whats app dark, whatsapp dark, dark mode whatsapp, dark mode whats app, whatsapp fullscreen, whats app full screen, whats app fullscreen, what app, whatapp, fullscreen, full screen, watsapp, wats app, rottweiler, celestial

data.name: Minor YouTube Tweaks
data.description:
This is just a quick-and-simple personal style that helps with some little annoyances on YouTube:

- Makes visited links dark grey. This works on both light and dark themes.
- Hides player controls invisible when the mouse is not hovered over the video. This makes it easier to pause and take a screenshot without the player controls getting in the way.
- Hides the 'Updated ToS' dialog in the bottom-left of the screen.

data.description: Visualize that there is no whitespace.

data.name: Material Dark Facebook
data.description:
A Material Dark Theme for Facebook. Based on VSCode/Jetbrains Material theme.

IMPORTANT

  • - You must have "new" Facebook enabled. (See how)
  • - You need to activate "Dark mode" (See link just above)
  • - Doesn't work on messenger currently
Github Repo This theme is SUPER easy to customize ; you just need to change hue and/or saturation to get your own dark nuance. Custom accent doesn't work everywhere for now. You can uncomment to test it but it won't apply everywhere. If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
